column1: Jagaluru is a panchayat town in Davanagere district in the Indian state of Karnataka.

Jagaluru is located at 14.53°N 76.35°E﻿ / 14.53; 76.35. It has an average elevation of 668 metres (2191 feet). Rangayyanadurga forest of this taluk is a house for four horned-antelope an endangered species in India.People say that Jagalur has got its name by a sage named Jagalurajja . Imam Sab
column2: who served as an education minister in the period of Maharaja of Mysore Sri Krisnaraja wodeyer IV
column3: has done memorable services for the development of Jagalur.
